front.title: YANG Groupings for SSH Clients and SSH Servers

abstract.t: This document defines seven YANG 1.1 modules. Three "IETF" modules, and four supporting "IANA" modules. The three IETF modules are: ietf-ssh-common, ietf-ssh-client, and ietf-ssh-server. The "ietf-ssh-client" and "ietf-ssh-server" modules are the primary productions of this work, enabling the configuration and monitoring of SSH clients and servers. The four IANA modules are: iana-ssh-encryption-algs, iana-ssh-key- exchange-algs, iana-ssh-mac-algs, and iana-ssh-public-key-algs. These modules each define YANG identities for an IANA-maintained algorithm registry.
